Useful Resources

Here is a list of the best materials for learning operating system development:

  • OSDev Wiki – The most important source of documentation.
  • os-tutorial – A practical tutorial from basics to kernel.
  • Writing an OS in Rust – A great course on OS development in Rust.
  • GRUB Manual – Documentation for the GRUB bootloader.
  • The Little Book About OS Development – A light and accessible book.

Remember, OS development requires patience and experimentation. Documentation and community are key!
